title: Daughter - Medicine, Person Of Interest S03E20
author: TVManiac
comment: Hands down one of the best TV shows I've ever seen.

This episode of PoI was one of best episodes of the entire series, Moral question of killing one in the name of saving many, Resse with tears in eyes, Finch questioning the machine. So much emotions and this perfect ending with black screen blinking through scene with this emotional music. So awesome, I cannot even express it. Love this show! Thank You TVManiac for posting this song, that's what I was looking for after watching this episode. I can't stop thinking about it. Tremendous.
this song remains the best for this show, it's bring a lot of emotion, Still here listening to this song even if it's 2019, and I know that I'll listen for it again and again just to remember POI.
Easily one of the most moving moments in the series. Season 3 has been a blast
If they played this during Carter's death, I woulda cried.
description:
A beautiful song!
Thank you Person of Interest. :)
